job.title: AI / Machine Learning Engineer (Virtual - Early Career)
job.description: the lockheed martin artificial intelligence center laic team is seeking an inquisitive developer responsible for investigating and implementing services that enhance mlops deployment as a part of the ai factory an enterprise machine learning and artificial intelligence mlai platform the selected candidate will focus on model test optimization monitoring and explainability the selected candidate will also contribute to a broad range of projects across the enterprise to increase machine learning availability and value to lockheed martinltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtthe selected candidates responsibilities will includeltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt identifying existing model test and deployment pain pointsltligtltligt researching understanding and evaluating thirdparty or inhouse technology solutionsltligtltligt developing relationships with thirdparty technology providersltligtltligt supporting evaluation initiatives by implementing and evaluating model test and monitoring software solutionsltligtltligt collaborating with mlops data and infrastructure teamsltligtltligt presenting evaluation outcomes and recommend enterprisewide solution next stepsltbrgtltligtltulgtthe selected candidate can work at any major lockheed martin facility or remotely in the us must be a us citizenltbrgtltbrgt
